name: PotentialSpawns
description: Called by WorldServer to gather a list of all possible entities that can spawn at the specified location. If an entry is added to the list, it needs to be a globally unique instance. The event is called in WorldServer#getSpawnListEntryForTypeAt(EnumCreatureType, BlockPos) as well as WorldServer#canCreatureTypeSpawnHere(EnumCreatureType creatureType, BiomeGenBase.SpawnListEntry spawnListEntry, BlockPos pos) where the latter checks for identity, meaning both events must add the same instance. Canceling the event will result in a empty list, meaning no entity will be spawned.
